description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Supports 1-31 players for fleet building and destruction on a galactic scale. Features fast paced action with insane zoom ins for close calls. Includes a 16 level challenge mode for solo play.
description.short: Supports 1-31 players for fleet building and destruction on a galactic scale. Features fast paced action with insane zoom ins for close calls. Includes a 16 level challenge mode for solo play.
